comments:
Description: 
   Add a interval on a column with type 'ANY', an error is thrown out.

Steps to reproduce:
  1. new a report
  2. new a datasource and a dataset 
  3. add a compute column on the dataset and set the type as 'ANY'
  4. drag the data set to the layout 
  5. add a grounp on the table and set a interval in the grounp
  6. save and preview

Expected result:
  The data are display correctly

Actual result:
   Error0 : data.engine.group.interval ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Setting a numeric interval on a column with type org.eclipse.birt.core.data.DataType$AnyType is not supported. at In doing group interval, Data Engine will first do data type check. If it finds that the data type is not satisfied with the group interval type, it will throw an exception.

traces.message: Setting a numeric interval on a column with type org.eclipse.birt.core.data.DataType$AnyType is not supported.
